name: Simple-Layout Basic Tutorial
body:
### Simple-Layout basic tutorial.
Simple Layout is an easy way to layout app/game assets without caring about what is the final resolution.
In this tutorial I will show you how to create a welcome screen with a menu for a memory game.
You can view the result here, resize the browser window to see how Simple-Layout deals with any given size.
You can get the full source code here.

In this tutorial I will be using PixiJs, so we'll start by creating a simple index.html:
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
